attributes.action: Ensure that the Football Association finally take responsibility for yet another poor performance by our mens national football team
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whenever the England mens football team let us, the long suffering fans down the usual excuses are usually made:

1) The players have no passion
2) There are too many foreign players in our game
3) The media put too much pressure on the team
4) The manager is inept

No more excuses!

It's about time that the FA Board finally stood up and shouldered the blame for constant under performance. Nothing will change unless the FA are forced to change!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
